item.title: Kaguya-sama wa Kokurasetai 2x6
item.description: Shinogane show she’s truly a good guy. I loved how they prepared every single detail of the speech, all coordinated. Even though I liked…
item.content:encoded:
Shinogane show she’s truly a good guy. I loved how they prepared every single detail of the speech, all coordinated.

Even though I liked how they helped Miko on the stage it made no sense the vote results were that close. That aside, the episode was good. We had our dose of infuriating scene were they can’t seem to be honest with each other. Back to square one? We’ll see.

Also, Ishigami is the best. Great character development.

item.title: The Office 3x16
item.description: Oh boy this episode was super embarrasing. Just to think someone (Micheal) could crash a wedding (or any event for tha matter). Don’t you…
item.content:encoded:
Oh boy this episode was super embarrasing. Just to think someone (Micheal) could crash a wedding (or any event for tha matter).

Don’t you think Jim is losing his chance with Pam again? I can somewhat undestand him, he tried before leaving town and he doesn’t think the feelings have changed? Shouldn’t Pam take the step now?
